query:
SELECT 
  s.id as supplierId,
  s.companyName,
  u.email,
  COUNT(DISTINCT sr.id) as total_rates,
  COUNT(DISTINCT scc.countryCode) as countries_covered,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT scc.countryCode) as country_codes
FROM users u
INNER JOIN supplierUsers su ON su.userId = u.id
INNER JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = su.supplierId
LEFT JOIN supplierRates sr ON sr.supplierId = s.id AND sr.isServiceable = 1
LEFT JOIN supplierCoverageCountries scc ON scc.supplierId = s.id
WHERE u.email = '12@supplier.com'
GROUP BY s.id, s.companyName, u.email;

  u.email,
  COUNT(DISTINCT sr.id) as total_rates,
  COUNT(DISTINCT scc.countryCode) as countries_covered,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT scc.countryCode) as country_codes
FROM users u
INNER JOIN supplierUsers su ON su.userId = u.id
INNER JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = su.supplierId
LEFT JOIN supplierRates sr ON sr.supplierId = s.id AND sr.isServiceable = 1
LEFT JOIN supplierCoverageCountries scc ON scc.supplierId = s.id
WHERE u.email = '12@supplier.com'
GROUP BY s.id, s.companyName, u.email;
